title: SafuBTC
author: SafuBTC
content: The performance of the new Warzone 2 sucks on my GTX 1660, even at the lowest settings I still get freezing issues and FPS is at 26- 34 Max, sometimes the FPS drop to 10fps. Is there anyway I can stay at 40FPS using this graphic card?

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Yes I play WZ2 with a GIGABYTE NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4080 and it runs smoothly. The GTX 1660 is a 6 GB gpu it will run slowly.Â  Warzone 2 works best with at least a 8GB gpu or better so this will be a problem when gaming.

comments.author: hymperion
comments.body: performance also affects ram and cpu

comments.author: GraceRoss
comments.body: Do they have e-sports betting? I want to place a bet using the ole777 betting platform.
